title: Clients salute Deutsche Bank's trade finance expertise in slew of award wins
body:
150 years ago Deutsche Bank was founded to help German companies trade across borders. In the Trade Finance industry’s most important benchmark survey that attracted more than 7,000 valid votes and was based exclusively upon client feedback, Deutsche Bank scooped 15 No.1 positions, including five Market Leader and 10 Best Service awards and, for the third year running, the coveted accolade Best Trade Finance Bank in Europe, underscoring our strong market position in Europe. For the eight’s consecutive year clients voted Deutsche Bank Best Trade Finance Bank for Germany.
“Our understanding of what clients need for trading internationally - the risks, the pitfalls, the opportunities, the Dos and Don’ts – and our local expertise and network in countries around the world is second to none”, said Daniel Schmand, global Head of Trade Finance. “We draw from 150 years of experience, of which we can be proud.”
